remarks.format: ## Remarks 當簽章來自於 WinMD 檔案時，需要額外的處理，才能判斷目標型別是否為實值類型或參考型別。When the signature comes from a WinMD file, additional processing is needed to determine whether the target type is a value type or a reference type.
